title: China Wants to Boost Births. But It’s Wary of Losing Control.
content:
1. China Wants to Boost Births. But It’s Wary of Losing Control.  The New York Times
  2. China demographic crisis looms as population growth slips to slowest ever  Reuters
  3. China releases population census with enormous implications for the country's future  DW News
  4. Census figures add up to a huge challenge for China’s policymakers  South China Morning Post
  5. China's Slowing Population Growth Brightens the Climate Outlook  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 中国は出生数の増加を望んでいる。しかし、コントロールを失うことを警戒している。
中国希望提高出生率。但它对失去控制感到担忧。
中國希望提高出生率。但它對失去控制感到擔憂。
